attributes.action: Consider a Metoo rule for boys at school
attributes.additional_details: It makes boys feel like they can't do anything about sexual assault that they can't talk to anyone about it but it is different because if something happens to a girl let's say sexual assault it gets dealt with straight away but no action gets taken if it happens to boys at school
attributes.background: I want you to consider a metoo rule for boys as I feel that is unequal that girls have one

rejection.details:
Schools are responsible for protecting the welfare of all students, irrespective of their sex.

If you have been a victim of sexual harassment or are concerned about your school's policy on sexual harassment you should speak to your parents or a teacher about this.

If you want to speak to someone about sexual harassment in school you could contact Childline: https://www.childline.org.uk/
